title: Skar-Gnar
body:
gnar in a  skarner outfit his boomarang will be made out of crystal
(now that ive said it it sounds more like a comp)

replies.body:
loving the idea! please riot the new skin is okay but i want something awesome.. and maybe a quote when he runs into a enemy skarner "shhoooooooo skarrrrrrnnnneeerrr"
cause we all know he's bit on the derp side when it comes to talking
DOES SKARNER THEN GET A GNAR SKIN. fair is fair
that sounds interesting skarner with a orange fur coating
off topic : ive probably played against skarner twice in a year lol
